title: Type play (or whatchamacallit)..
content:
Playing with type. simple amateurish designs:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kick_4522.jpg)

and

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hide_4535.jpg)

nagfa
author: nagfa

comments.content: Hey Nagfa, nice ideas and execution – keep up the good work

Thank you all. Feeling very humbled right now.

I'll post some recent attempts:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comb_3715.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/camel_5890.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dyslexic_5907.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/redfish_4249.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/parallel_5734.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shout_3818.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/confused_3434.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/run%202_3561.jpg)

Some are bad. Some are worse. I understand some concepts could have been thought of before (very new in this type-logo thingamajig)

nagfa

These are a lot of fun.  
Kick is absolutely brilliant!

It is fun when you know you hit it just right.

Two more:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/strong_3822.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flaccid_5563.jpg)

nagfa

One more to share:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wbush_4041.jpg)
  
W.Bush

nagfa

hah. go to sleep now.

**Paul**  
 [Design Studio Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018233152/http:/www.allthingsconsidered.com.au/)
